title.rendered: Automation Hour:  Community Users with Flow and Platform Events

content.rendered:
Automation Hour 2019
Forgot UsernameSeptember 2019


Use Case

Looking for a declarative way to do a forgot username on communities. No out of the box componentSecurity prevents guests from User Lookup

The Presenters

Meighan Brodkey
Meighan is a technical architect and the leader of the Seattle Women in Tech User Group leader. With over 300 Trailhead badges, Meighan is continuously working on increasing her Salesforce knowledge and helping others do so as well. She has spoken around the world about Salesforce. Her presentations include Dreamforce 17, Surf Force 17, and the Chicago World Tour. Sharing her love of the platform with the Ohana is her passion. Over the past decade Meighan has gone from admin to architect, thanks in part to all of the knowledge shared by and help from other members of the community. She gives back to the community via Twitter, the Trailblazer Community and her blog.Twitter: @meighanSF

Resources


Deck

Meighan brodkey automation hour from Meighan Brodkey

View Deck


YouTube Video



Read More

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey Custom Rollup Summary Fields
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Meighan Brodkey presents a great session on Rollup Summary Fields with Lookups. Meighan takes the standard "Rollup" mentality to the next level with dynamic rollups based on what type of record is connected to the record. An awesome scenario that can show you how to take your automation to the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour W/ Guest Presenter Meighan Brodkey Auto-Add Users to Chatter Groups
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Automation Hour W/ Guest Presenter Meighan Brodkey December 16, 2016See how you can auto-add users to Chatter Groups when edited or created using clicks not code.  Using a List Custom Setting, a Flow, and a Process, you can automation the creation of Chatter Group members for your internal and external…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour 2021: Einstein Bot Flows &  Omni-Channel Routing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Curious about Einstein Bots, Flow, or the new Omni-Channel Routing functionality? In this episode of Automation Hour, you'll learn about AI and all of that inside of Salesforce from Technical Architect & Salesforce MVP, Meighan Brodkey.

img.alt_text: Automation Hour: Flows, Bots, and AI… OH MY!!!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey 3: Flow Components
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Presentation I was honored be a guest presenter on Automation Hour for the 3rd time in 2018. Within the last year salesforce released the ability to use Lightning Components within Visual Workflow.  This allows for massive amounts of increased functionality, as well as the ability to do smaller amounts of…
